website_summaries.verdict: The M1 is YI's first attempt at a standalone camera. It offers attractive features like 20MP photos and 4K video, but is held back by sluggish performance.

customer_reviews.title: Amateur
customer_reviews.text: I give this camera 5 stars. I’m not a photographer by any means yet. But this camera takes really great pictures by my standards. I’m most excited about being able to Bluetooth link it to my smart phone, download, and edit pictures so that I can upload amazing pictures to my social media quickly. So far it’s very easy to operate. Light weight. Small so fits in my hand comfortably. May submit another review after I have really learned to work it but so far very pleased.
